name: Behbes Adventures!
description:
- This is a Tech Demo - 

Behbes Adventures! is a fun Action Adventure Platformer game with a Collect-a-thon mechanic where you can craft the plush characters you play as and explore the soft, crafty world around you.

**PLEASE READ THE COMMUNITY STICKYNOTE/DEVLOG DETAILS FOR KNOWN ISSUES WITH THIS DEMO**

If you wish to support the games development, you can also donate through Kofi:

https://ko-fi.com/behbesadventures
